quote: Your diet is a bank account. Good food choices are good investments.
name: Bethenny Frankel

quote: Vegetables are a must on a diet. I suggest carrot cake, zucchini bread, and pumpkin pie.
name: Jim Davis

quote: An optimist is a person who starts a new diet on Thanksgiving Day.
name: Irv Kupcinet

quote: Pasta doesn't make you fat. How much pasta you eat makes you fat.
name: Giada De Laurentiis

quote: I think of dieting, then I eat pizza.
name: Lara Stone

quote: I don't go long without eating. I never starve myself: I grab a healthy snack.
name: Vanessa Hudgens

quote: I naturally favour a clean, healthy diet. A salad sandwich is one of my favourite meals!
name: Victoria Pendleton

quote: People have got to learn: if they don't have cookies in the cookie jar, they can't eat cookies.
name: Suze Orman

quote: I never worry about diets. The only carrots that interest me are the number you get in a diamond.
name: Mae West

quote: The more colorful the food, the better. I try to add color to my diet, which means vegetables and fruits.
name: Misty May-Treanor

quote: A healthy diet is a solution to many of our health-care problems. It's the most important solution.
name: John Mackey

quote: No disease that can be treated by diet should be treated with any other means.
name: Maimonides

quote: Pizza is no longer on my diet.
name: John Catsimatidis

quote: Cereal eating is almost a marker for a healthy lifestyle. It sets you up for the day, so you don't overeat.
name: Bruce Barton

quote: The second day of a diet is always easier than the first. By the second day you're off it.
name: Jackie Gleason

quote: The diet, to be healthy, has to be mostly fruits, vegetables, beans, nuts and seeds.
name: Joel Fuhrman

quote: I try to cook more now so I can control my diet and what I ingest.
name: Sara Sampaio

quote: The best doctors in the world are Doctor Diet, Doctor Quiet, and Doctor Merryman.
name: Jonathan Swift

quote: You can't exercise your way out of a bad diet.
name: Mark Hyman

quote: Every single diet I ever fell off of was because of potatoes and gravy of some sort.
name: Dolly Parton

quote: I don't stop eating when I'm full. The meal isn't over when I'm full. It's over when I hate myself.
name: Louis C. K.

quote: I keep my diet low in carbohydrates and high in protein.
name: Sullivan Stapleton

quote: I like food too much to go on some crazy diet. French fries are my favorite downfall.
name: Holly Madison

quote: I never diet. I smoke. I drink now and then. I never work out.
name: Naomi Campbell

quote: Nothing burns more calories than dancing in 5-inch heels... try it!
name: Ariana Grande

quote: I can't be on the cheeseburger diet all the time.
name: Bobby Flay

quote: Diets, like clothes, should be tailored to you.
name: Joan Rivers

quote: A plant-based diet is like a one-stop shop against chronic diseases.
name: Michael Greger

quote: I consider fitness, diet, and beauty to be essential to a balanced self.
name: Hannah Bronfman

quote: French fries. I love them. Some people are chocolate and sweets people. I love French fries. That and caviar.
name: Cameron Diaz

quote: I'm naturally a muscular gal with some curves, so eating a Mediterranean diet makes my body happy.
name: Debi Mazar

quote: Weight Watchers is not intimidating. It's not a diet. It's a lifestyle.
name: Jessica Simpson

quote: Push-ups, sit-ups, and a strict diet of raisins. That's my plan.
name: Jack Black

quote: My soul is dark with stormy riot: directly traced over to diet.
name: Samuel Hoffenstein

quote: The vegan diet is obviously lacking whatever essential nutrient it is that makes people likeable.
name: Jim Goad

quote: We never repent of having eaten too little.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: In general, mankind, since the improvement of cookery, eats twice as much as nature requires.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: I've done everything every fat person ever has. I've tried every diet.
name: Dolly Parton

quote: My interesting diet tips are eat early and don't nosh between meals. I mean, I can pack it away.
name: Carol Burnett

quote: Fruit is definitely on the maintenance diet. It's on the lifestyle diet.
name: Robert Atkins

quote: What some call health, if purchased by perpetual anxiety about diet, isn't much better than tedious disease.
name: Alexander Pope

quote: Everyone's been on a ramen noodle diet once or twice.
name: Kim Shaw

quote: Food is an important part of a balanced diet.
name: Fran Lebowitz

quote: Want to learn to eat a lot? Here it is: Eat a little. That way, you will be around long enough to eat a lot.
name: Tony Robbins

quote: I drink Diet Coke from the minute I get up to the minute I go to bed.
name: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: I'm an emotional eater. When I get upset, my diet goes out the window.
name: Kelly Osbourne

quote: The only way you get that fat off is to eat less and exercise more.
name: Jack LaLanne

quote: You should never go on diet and must follow a healthy lifestyle.
name: Nargis Fakhri

quote: My doctor told me to stop having intimate dinners for four. Unless there are three other people.
name: Orson Welles

quote: The heart, like the stomach, wants a varied diet.
name: Gustave Flaubert

quote: When we get in late and the only thing open is fast food, it can be tough to maintain a healthy diet.
name: Mike Trout

quote: A friend doesn't go on a diet because you are fat.
name: Erma Bombeck

quote: I don't care how pumped up or psyched you are to start a new diet or a new program - that emotion will fade.
name: Phil McGraw

quote: You don't want to make a steady diet of just lettuce. You don't want to make a steady diet of fried chicken.
name: Paula Deen

quote: The first couple of days on the detox diet aren't pleasant.
name: Carol Vorderman

quote: The dieting wars have got to stop.
name: Lady Gaga

quote: I have to be on such a strict diet constantly.
name: Lady Gaga

quote: In New York I pretty much live in diners - I order French Fries, Diet Coke floats and lots of coffee.
name: Lana Del Rey

quote: Once you have to start counting calories, it takes away from the joy of eating.
name: Mireille Guiliano

quote: Of capital importance is to have a good diet and exercise a lot.
name: Evelyn Lauder

quote: I used to drink tons of caffeine. Now I make smoothies with frozen berries and Green Vibrance health powder.
name: Leighton Meester

quote: You need a nutritional love diet. Don't put the junk stuff in your body - it's not going to do you any good.
name: Joanna Coles

quote: Life is too short to be on a diet.
name: Taylor Jenkins Reid

quote: I don't find it a struggle to maintain a healthy diet now as my palate has changed. I don't crave rich food.
name: Jennifer Ellison

quote: When followed correctly, the Dukan Diet is both a safe and effective method of weight loss.
name: Pierre Dukan

quote: Dieting is murder on the road. Show me a man who travels and I'll show you one who eats.
name: Bruce Froemming

quote: I love food - I am never on a diet - I swear to God!
name: Irina Shayk

quote: Frankly, I don't trust any diet that doesn't allow sugar.
name: Bethenny Frankel

quote: The fact is, I diet every day of my life. I have to work at it. But I diet so I can pig out.
name: Jack Nicklaus

quote: A diet should be named after what you do eat, not what you don't eat.
name: Robert Atkins

quote: Include ample fruits and vegetables in your diet and no fried or oily food.
name: Sridevi

quote: People who shop in health food stores never look healthy.
name: Amy Sedaris

quote: When I feel stressed, I turn to food for comfort, but I don't like to diet and I'm not good at it.
name: Salma Hayek

quote: I follow a dairy-free and gluten-free diet, which can be challenging in some places.
name: Brandon Boyd

quote: I really don't follow a strict diet; I just watch my fat intake and stay away from fried foods.

quote: The comedian sticks as religiously to her theme as a dancer sticks to a diet.
name: Jo Brand

quote: Diet is really important, and I think vitamins are really important, also.
name: Glenn Danzig

quote: My biggest regret is putting my body through fad diets - Atkins, cleanses, the hCG diet.
name: Jennie Garth

quote: Many cows are fed a high-protein diet, which creates a more liquid manure that is easier to spray on fields.
name: Charles Duhigg

quote: I don't need a diet pill. I need something that gives you an electric shock when you reach for food.
name: Joy Behar

quote: I am a pure vegetarian, and I'm much healthier compared to those who live on a non-veg diet.
name: Sangram Singh

quote: As I mentioned previously, the tools that allow for optimum health are diet and exercise.
name: Bill Toomey

quote: Breastfeeding is the very best diet I've been on.
name: Rebecca Romijn

quote: Fat is your friend. The brain thrives on a fat-rich, low-carbohydrate diet.
name: David Perlmutter

quote: The unforgivable political sin is vanity; the killer diet is sour grapes.
name: Neil Kinnock

quote: Leave the table while you still feel you could eat a little more.
name: Helena Rubinstein

quote: I'm not perfect, but what's wonderful about eating a plant-based diet is, I don't have to be.
name: Victoria Moran

quote: The majority of my diet is probably vegetables, but I'm not a vegetarian or vegan.
name: Abigail Spencer

quote: I don't believe in depriving myself of any food or being imprisoned by a diet.
name: Joely Fisher

quote: Since having the babies, I realize that 90 percent of losing weight is my diet.
name: Mariah Carey

quote: I keep a fairly strict diet. My job depends on it.
name: Candace Cameron Bure

quote: I don't eat junk foods and I don't think junk thoughts.
name: Peace Pilgrim

quote: High-quality food is better for your health.
name: Michael Pollan

quote: An athlete's diet is a complicated thing.
name: Chuck Norris

quote: If you're going to choose to do something like the Paleo Diet, then you choose not to enjoy your nights out.
name: Chrissy Teigen

quote: Start your diet during a period of optimism and happiness.
name: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: My diet is high on protein, which keeps me energised and fresh.
name: Karan Patel

quote: I try to not be too hard on myself regarding my diet. I've always been a workout-to-eat kind of a girl.
name: Jennie Finch

quote: My mom was always really healthy and cautious about her diet, so I'm not a big sugar guy.
name: Paul Walker

quote: My diet works for me because I can be very flexible about what I eat in a day.
name: Madelaine Petsch

quote: I've never been one that was on a diet, because I always ate well.
name: Donovan Bailey

quote: As a coach you can influence the diet of your players. You can point out what is wrong.
name: Arsene Wenger

quote: Any woman who diets all the time can't help but be grouchy. Nobody can be amusing or entertaining on a diet.

quote: My diet is very kale-heavy. It's so nutrient-dense. I stay away from fake processed stuff.
name: Daniel Bryan

quote: I'd much rather eat exactly what I want, and then burn it off, than diet.
name: Ricky Gervais

quote: As for those grapefruit and buttermilk diets, I'll take roast chicken and dumplings.
name: Hattie McDaniel

quote: I don't diet. I just don't eat as much as I'd like to.
name: Linda Evangelista

quote: You cannot out-exercise a bad diet.
name: Harley Pasternak

quote: I have had cardiomyopathy, which is a non-coronary condition and is in no way related to diet.
name: Robert Atkins

quote: Health food makes me sick.
name: Calvin Trillin

quote: I've never been on a diet and never will.
name: Paul Hollywood

quote: I will never, ever go on a carb-free diet.
name: Paul Hollywood

quote: My mother always wants me to put me on a diet.
name: Twinkle Khanna

quote: If I go on a diet and work out, I'm always in a bad mood. I'd rather be a little heavier but nice.
name: Salma Hayek

quote: Most of my diet is low on carbohydrates and fats.
name: Gautam Gambhir

quote: For me, juicing isn't about binging and cleansing; I try to incorporate it into a balanced diet.

quote: I'm trying to do the paleo diet. No carbs.
name: Robin Wright

quote: I have tried every diet to lose weight. When you restrict yourself, you're setting yourself up for failure.

quote: Yeah, I'm kind of fit. And I'm quite careful about my diet.
name: Orlando Bloom

quote: Diet is weird. It's elusive. I just try to listen to my body.
name: Laura Dern

quote: Your future health can be predicted by the nutrient density of your diet.
name: Joel Fuhrman

quote: To provide optimal levels of protective micronutrients, a diet must be vegetable-based, not grain-based.
name: Joel Fuhrman

quote: If you want ideal health, you need to overcompensate and eat an excellent diet.
name: Joel Fuhrman

quote: I pay attention to my diet to be a healthier gymnast, but I'm not obsessive over it.
name: Shawn Johnson

quote: I need protein from food rather than just protein supplements. I changed my diet.
name: Travis Barker

quote: Cutting meat out of your diet is the best thing you can do for animals and your own health.
name: Joan Jett

quote: You can't be fat and fast, too; so lift, run, diet and work.
name: Hank Stram

quote: I do practice what I preach when it comes to nutrition.
name: Mehmet Oz

quote: I don't believe in diets. I don't believe any diet ever works.
name: Sinbad

quote: I've never been on a fad diet.
name: Denise Van Outen

quote: Feeding is a very important ritual for me. I don't trust people who don't like to eat.
name: Gina Gershon

quote: I've always eaten well and have a balanced diet.
name: Christy Turlington

quote: I love Spanish food. My diet is the Mediterranean diet, which is good food. I eat well.
name: Penelope Cruz

quote: I don't think you can name one diet I haven't done.
name: Trisha Yearwood

quote: Once you lose the weight, you're really anxious to eat healthy.
name: Etta James

quote: I don't have too strict a diet.
name: Gretchen Bleiler

quote: I'm always trying to learn and grow, so my diet has, over the years, evolved.
name: J. J. Watt

quote: I am very lucky in that I can eat what I want and don't have to follow any special diet.
name: Carine Roitfeld

quote: The circuit training program along with a healthy clean diet is the way to excellent results.
name: Lee Haney

quote: It looks to me to be obvious that the whole world cannot eat an American diet.
name: Jerry Brown

quote: I don't do the gym and I don't diet. I'm vegetarian but I don't diet.
name: Pamela Anderson

quote: When I'm training hard, the diet is miserable.
name: Luke Evans

quote: I am diabetic. So diet control is a pre-given for me.

quote: My plant-based diet plus fish is to credit for my low blood pressure, high energy, and robust immunity.
name: David H. Murdock

quote: It's one thing to lose weight, but it's another thing to eat healthy.
name: Jennifer Hudson

quote: If I like myself at this weight, then this is what I'm going to be. I don't have an eating disorder.
name: Courteney Cox

quote: I work out really hard, and I stay on my diet all week.
name: Charlotte McKinney

quote: My whole thing isn't about being vegan, to be honest. It's more about a more natural diet.
name: Ella Woodward

quote: Living on hypocrisy is not a healthy diet for patriots.
name: Tom Tancredo

quote: I've given up coffee, made diet changes.
name: Boy George

quote: I am not qualified to talk about the diet. Simply because I am not a dietician.
name: Mark Spitz

quote: You feel better when you're eating food that retains nutritional value.
name: Amber Heard

quote: Sometimes I've had to put myself on a diet.
name: Roger Moore

quote: I think by planning an exercise regime, your diet follows to some extent.
name: Dolph Lundgren

quote: 'The 17 Day Diet' keeps your body and metabolism guessing. I call this 'body confusion.'

quote: I never count calories, but I eat so well.
name: Alicia Silverstone

quote: It's easy to diet or get off a diet when you've got a juicy role to play.
name: Kim Cattrall

quote: A diet that is high in fat, sugar and salt makes it really hard for a body to function efficiently.

quote: I still love to eat, and my diet isn't perfect.
name: Rob Kardashian

quote: Everyone is going to binge on a diet, for instance, so plan for it, schedule it, and contain the damage.
name: Tim Ferriss

quote: I have to be very careful about diet and exercise.

quote: I don't have a very good diet.
name: Margot Robbie

quote: The only specialized diet that I follow is home-cooked food.
name: Sangram Singh

quote: Neither am I on an extreme diet nor am I on an extreme workout.
name: Jacqueline Fernandez

quote: I'm only drinking white wine because I'm on a diet and I don't eat.
name: Oliver Reed

quote: I try my best to be extremely disciplined about my diet.
name: Mika Brzezinski

quote: My diet is always terrible, unfortunately. I don't know moderation.

name: Della Reese

quote: I am a big-structured guy, and so I always felt my weight was justified until I chanced upon Cavemen's diet.
name: Harshvardhan Rane

quote: I try to get a well-balanced diet with a mix of greens, protein, and carbs.
name: Hilary Knight

quote: Getting a moral lecture from the fashion industry is like Jeffrey Dahmer criticising your diet.
name: Charlie Brooker

quote: Diet Coke is the only way I get through filming because I get so tired.
name: Lily James

quote: I don't believe in fad diets.
name: Jenny Craig

quote: I followed the same diet for 20 years, eliminating starches, living on salads, lean meat, and small portions.

quote: Hope is a very thin diet.
name: Thomas Shadwell

quote: A bonus: You don't have to diet to direct.
name: Joey Lauren Adams

quote: I need my food to keep my energy up, so I can't really diet.
name: Sienna Miller

quote: I have been on a diet since 1962.
name: Mary Quant

quote: Keep your energy levels high by adding bananas and egg whites to your diet.
name: Nargis Fakhri

quote: I highly recommend worrying. It is much more effective than dieting.
name: William Powell

quote: I was elected to the Diet in the same way as at every parliamentary election.
name: Fritz Sauckel

quote: I was member of the Diet as long as it existed, until May 1933.
name: Fritz Sauckel

quote: The Diet was dissolved by a Reich Government decree.
name: Fritz Sauckel

quote: Diet hard, train hard.
name: Jinder Mahal

quote: I eat every two hours to balance my diet.
name: Jinder Mahal

quote: Most Americans live on a diet that includes processed fare that is neither fresh nor natural.
name: Homaro Cantu

quote: I tried the maple syrup diet. I tried the protein-only Atkins diet.

quote: I'm gluten intolerant, so that automatically cuts carbs from my diet.
name: Malin Akerman

quote: I'm lucky, I don't like sweets, not even chocolate.
name: Eva Herzigova

name: Kathy Freston

quote: I really believe that my family's infrequency of getting sick is due to our diet.
name: Kristin Cavallari

quote: I realize that I'm a mature woman and one of these days, incredible diet or not, I'll be a little old lady.
name: Victoria Moran

quote: This cream will help one's nature strengthen and grow, The diet gives support in my decline.
name: Du Fu

quote: I don't let my wardrobe dictate my diet.
name: Mary Helen Bowers

quote: I'm not gonna lie: I'm kinda the worst with a diet.
name: Nina Agdal

quote: I don't have a diet. Jenny Craig got a diet. Seriously. I eat to live, not to die.
name: Bernard Hopkins

quote: I've tried just about every crazy diet you can imagine.
name: Brooke Burke

quote: I had to get healthy for a period in my life, so I learned a lot about food and diet.
name: Cobie Smulders

quote: She used to diet on any kind of food she could lay her hands on.
name: Arthur Baer

quote: I try to eat fruit and veggies and meat and all the different categories and have a well rounded diet.
name: Andrew Luck

name: Joel Robuchon

quote: If you can eat 70 percent raw or introduce raw into your diet, it will help your health.
name: Carol Alt

quote: I'm not strictly vegetarian, but meat doesn't play a big part in my diet.
name: Katie Holmes

quote: I always have eaten really healthy, but I'm not a diet freak.
name: Behati Prinsloo

quote: I almost fainted. There was no family history. I had been eating a vegetarian diet and I exercised.
name: Rue McClanahan

quote: I never, ever, restrict food, and I will never go on a diet ever again.
name: Portia de Rossi

quote: The best physicians are Dr. Diet, Dr. Quiet, and Dr. Merryman.
name: Daniel D. Palmer

quote: I eat a balanced diet.
name: Chuck Liddell

name: Chuck Liddell

quote: If you follow a strict diet for a few months, flaunting six packs abs is no big deal.
name: Akkineni Nagarjuna

quote: Diet is essential for a player, and I have to look after myself.

quote: Growing up in the north of Holland, I had a healthy and balanced diet.

quote: We are increasingly offered a diet in which sensation, not story, is king.
name: Beeban Kidron

quote: I am healthy because of my strict diet. I can eat anything, but I don't eat everything.

quote: I've probably tried every fad diet in the world.
name: Jenna Ushkowitz

name: Hazel Keech

quote: When the season ends, I like to take a little time off from the diet I follow when I'm playing.

quote: Mine is the least fat diet in the world.
name: Pierre Dukan

quote: And I grew up on a steady diet of science fiction, especially apocalyptic and postapocalyptic fiction.
name: Justin Cronin

name: Keith Emerson

quote: I've done every diet there is.
name: Kate Walsh

quote: I'm on this diet where you're supposed to eat only fish and meat.
name: Lasse Hallstrom

quote: I am pretty strict with my diet because I have some stomach health problems.

quote: I think you need a little fat in your diet.
name: Arden Myrin

quote: If you're an actress, you're always on one diet or another - it's a way of life.
name: Leigh-Allyn Baker

quote: I eat a lot of ice - isn't that ridiculous? I chew on ice, and I have maybe two diet sodas a day.
